snippet: The hedge fund faithful gather in Las Vegas and New York for the two big conferences of the year. | The firm responsible for sending checks to homeowners as compensation for foreclosure abuses has erred again. | Tesla will stop detailing how many...
abstract: The hedge fund faithful gather in Las Vegas and New York for the two big conferences of the year. | The firm responsible for sending checks to homeowners as compensation for foreclosure abuses has erred again. | Tesla will stop detailing how many reservations exist for its cars. | More debate on whether Jamie Dimon should remain both C.E.O. and chairman of JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Hedge Funds Step Into the Limelight
